alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Davidson County through 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nashville International Airport, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Oak Hill, Antioch, Berry Hill and Percy Priest Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 near mile marker 206, and between mile markers 208 and 220. Interstate 65 between mile markers 78 and 82. Interstate 24 between mile markers 48 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
